title: Bug 19848Action multiple set contributions lost when one action set removed
SR: Bug 19848Action multiple set contributions lost when one action set removed 200206101) Open resource perspective2) WindowCustomize Perspective3) Turn on Java Debug, OK4) Look at the contents of the run menu5) WindowCustomize Perspective6) Turn on Debug, Launch, OK7) Look at the contents of the run menu8) WindowCustomize Perspective9) Turn off Java Debug, OK10) Look at the contents of the run menu, all action set contributions are gone.
